info.title: CAPTCHA Protocol
info.description: This protocol defines how all the available captcha mechanisms will interact with the server and validate themselves.

method.name: set
method.description: Set captcha value as a session variable

parameter.name: $formID
parameter.description: The id of the form that contains the captcha

parameter.name: $captchaValue
parameter.description: The value that the captcha was initialized with

parameter.name: $formID
parameter.description: The id of the form that is validating

parameter.name: $captchaValue
parameter.description: The value that the form received and wants to validate
